title: Please confirm your Event Posting
textBody:
Thank you, %s, for hosting a community event at the Kafka Summit.

Please click on the link below to review your event posting and confirm it by clicking on the `Verify or Update Event` button.
IMPORTANT: Your event will not be posted until you go to this website and click the button.
https://someurl.com/update?id=%s&token=%s 

Thank you and have a wonderful conference!
- The DataSQRL team [https://www.datasqrl.com]

title: A post has been flagged
textBody:
The post with id [%s] has been flagged by a user: %s
